pullRequest.title: Create the default database if it does not exist when opening the catalog
pullRequest.bodyText:
This fix the issue #1434.
It's necessary to create the default database if it does not exist in the newly created catalog.

commit.message: Create the default database if it does not exist when opening the catalog

nodes.bodyText: Does this do what you want? It seems like if the intent is IF NOT EXISTS then you should ignore the DatabaseAlreadyExistException.
Should this be metadata instead of comments? I think that it could contain other properties, right?
Nit: other statements use all caps for SQL reserved words. Should this be SHOW TABLES?
